main.block_1.slider_3.desc: The main advantage of air transportation is the maximum efficiency of delivery of products from one point to another in a few hours.
main.block_1.slider_1.title: Ocean Freight
main.block_1.slider_1.desc: Ocean cargo transportation allows you to purchase products from almost anywhere in the world. At the same time, during the shipment of products, the weight and size of a particular product is not so important.
main.block_1.slider_2.title: Land transport
main.block_1.slider_2.desc: Accessibility to access roads of warehouses and manufacturing enterprises for loading and unloading goods; versatility. The main direction of our work is considered to be rail transportation from other countries to the Republic of Kazakhstan.
main.block_2.logistic.title: Transport logistics
main.block_2.logistic.desc: Transport logistics involves the organization of moving objects to a given point with the development of an optimal route.The following main tasks can be distinguished:
main.block_2.monitor.title: MONITORING
main.block_2.monitor.desc: We monitor the market in order to identify reliable suppliers. We have the best practices and offer a search for a supplier according to the specified parameters.
main.block_2.transport.title: CARGO TRANSPORTATION
main.block_2.transport.desc: Trucks from Almaty depart daily to all international destinations. The most popular routes are the CIS countries (Russia, Ukraine, Belarus).

main.block_3.train.title: Railway transport
main.block_3.train.desc: This is a vehicle, on vehicles that move on rails (rails or railways). This is one of the most important, frequently used and very economical methods of transportation and transportation of goods both over long and short distances
main.block_3.earth.title: Land transport
main.block_3.earth.desc: Land transport is the transportation or movement of people, animals or goods from one place to another place on land.
main.block_4.title: 100% security and reliability
main.block_4.desc: At Ubios service, we want to make sure that you feel confident when ordering from us. We collect your personal information in order to place your order and quickly deliver the necessary goods to you in a 100% secure environment. We do not store your credit card information and will never share, sell or distribute your personal information such as your name, address or any other information that you provide to us. We do not sell or transfer your personal information.
